channel.title: Feature request: ship Whonix with darkweb-everywhere installed in Tor Browser
channel.description:
https://github.com/chris-barry/darkweb-everywhere
This can be installed manually, but it will be nice to have it in Tor Browser by default, as well as having an /usr/bin/update-torbrowser script that is aware of it

item.title: Feature request: ship Whonix with darkweb-everywhere installed in Tor Browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I think it would be better if The Tor Project added this to TBB? Write a feature request against TBB?

If only Whonix had it installed by default, users using Whonix Tor Browser in Whonix would end up with a different web fingerprint than other Tor Browser users.

Also lots of other issues would open up. Some from https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Default_Application_Policy.

Read full topic
item.source: Feature request: ship Whonix with darkweb-everywhere installed in Tor Browser

item.title: Feature request: ship Whonix with darkweb-everywhere installed in Tor Browser
item.dc:creator: Greenwhonix
item.description:
GitHub

chris-barry/darkweb-everywhere

HTTPS Everywhere rulesets for hidden services and eepsites. - chris-barry/darkweb-everywhere

This can be installed manually, but it will be nice to have it in Tor Browser by default, as well as having an /usr/bin/update-torbrowser script that is aware of it

Read full topic
